charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant was found guilty on Counts 1, 2, 3 &; 4 of the Superseding Indictment on October 31, 2013. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 60 months on each of Counts 1, 2 and 3, to be served concurrently, and 120 months on Count 4, to be served consecutively, for a total term of 180 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years on each of Counts 1, 2, 3 and 4, to be served concurrently. MPA of $400 imposed. Restitution of $1,440,219.73 imposed. No fine.

charges.charge_description: CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)
EXPLOSIVES USED IN COMMISSION OF FELONY(4)
CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant was found guilty on Counts 1, 2 and 4 of the Superseding Indictment on October 31, 2012. The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 60 months on Count 1 and 120 months on Count 2, to be served concurrently, and 120 months on Count 4, to be served consecutively, for a total term of 240 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years on each of Counts 1, 2 and 4, to be served concurrently. MPA of $300 imposed. Restitution of $1,440,219.73 imopsed. No fine.

Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years on each of Counts 1, 2 and 4, to be served concurrently. MPA of $300 imposed. Restitution of $1,440,219.73 imopsed. No fine.
